name: Hillbomb
description:
Hillbomb was born from the love of two things: bombing steep hills on a skateboard and Sega's 1986 classic, Outrun.
Start at the top of the mountain and dodge your way through traffic and twisty roads all the way to the bottom in what is sure to be the greatest hillbomb to ever go down in history. You'll pass through 7 unique stages while trying to stay on the road and not get hit by traffic. Can you make it to the bottom?
